Menu

Pikachu (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0024: Arbok
Pokémon
#0026: Raichu →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Pikachu (TCG Pocket).

Pikachu has been featured on 218 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Pikachu cards are normally Lightning-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Pikachu

Pikachu
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
